item.title: Crystals and Concertos
item.author: Yingwei Ouyang,
item.description: It was the end of one of the last weeks of term; uni life was definitely hectic by that point, or at least it was for me. It was lab week, so although I was knackered from a long week of afternoons at the bench, Friday was exciting and rewarding. I had finally completed the third experiment of the â€¦
